name: contract.codex-registry
description: Contracts for Codex Protocol's Codex Registry

scripts.copy: cp build/contracts/CodexRecord.json build/contracts/CodexRecordV2.json build/contracts/CodexRecordProxy.json build/contracts/CodexCoin.json build/contracts/CodexStakeContract.json $PWD/../npm.ethereum-service/static/contracts-source/5777 && npm run build-ethereum-service
scripts.copy:ropsten: cp build/contracts/CodexRecord.json build/contracts/CodexRecordV2.json build/contracts/CodexRecordProxy.json build/contracts/CodexStakeContract.json $PWD/../npm.ethereum-service/static/contracts-source/3 && npm run build-ethereum-service
scripts.copy:rinkeby: cp build/contracts/CodexRecord.json build/contracts/CodexRecordV2.json build/contracts/CodexRecordProxy.json build/contracts/CodexStakeContract.json $PWD/../npm.ethereum-service/static/contracts-source/4 && npm run build-ethereum-service
scripts.copy:mainnet: cp build/contracts/CodexRecord.json build/contracts/CodexRecordV2.json build/contracts/CodexRecordProxy.json build/contracts/CodexStakeContract.json $PWD/../npm.ethereum-service/static/contracts-source/1 && npm run build-ethereum-service
scripts.migrate: npm run lint && truffle migrate --network ganache && npm run copy
scripts.migrate:reset: npm run clean && npm run lint && truffle migrate --reset --network ganache && npm run copy
scripts.migrate:upgrade: npm run lint && truffle migrate -f 8 --to 8 --network ganache && npm run copy
scripts.migrate:ropsten: npm run lint && truffle migrate --network ropsten && npm run copy:ropsten
scripts.migrate:reset:ropsten: npm run clean && npm run lint && truffle migrate --reset --network ropsten && npm run copy:ropsten
scripts.migrate:upgrade:ropsten: npm run lint && truffle migrate -f 8 --to 8 --network ropsten && npm run copy:ropsten
scripts.migrate:rinkeby: npm run lint && truffle migrate --network rinkeby && npm run copy:rinkeby
scripts.migrate:reset:rinkeby: npm run clean && npm run lint && truffle migrate --reset --network rinkeby && npm run copy:rinkeby
scripts.migrate:upgrade:rinkeby: npm run lint && truffle migrate -f 8 --to 8 --network rinkeby && npm run copy:rinkeby
scripts.migrate:mainnet: npm run lint && truffle migrate --network mainnet && npm run copy:mainnet
scripts.migrate:reset:mainnet: npm run clean && npm run lint && truffle migrate --reset --network mainnet && npm run copy:mainnet
scripts.migrate:upgrade:mainnet: npm run lint && truffle migrate -f 8 --to 8 --network mainnet && npm run copy:mainnet
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:sol

author: Codex Protocol <contact@codexprotocol.com>
